short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds mobile/responsive support to the LP101 forums.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
lockpicking101.com is a deep resource for hobbyist lockpickers, but the site has not yet been updated to be clearly readable on a mobile device. This add-on applies tweaks to the existing site for a more pleasant mobile viewing experience.

Source code: https://github.com/prevarikation/lp101-mobile-extension
